title: Cherry â€” Powdery mildew
description: White powdery fungal growth on leaves and shoots, often in humid but not saturated conditions. Prune for airflow and apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate treatments if needed.

treatment.chemical: Apply myclobutanil or sulfur-based fungicides at first sign of disease.
treatment.organic: Prune for airflow, use potassium bicarbonate or neem oil sprays.
